00026 // Vector/Matrix/Array Index Module  
00027 
00028 #ifndef INDEX_H
00029 #define INDEX_H
00030 
00031 #include "tnt/subscript.h"
00032 
00033 namespace TNT
00034 {
00035 
00036 class Index1D
00037 {
00038     Subscript lbound_;
00039     Subscript ubound_;
00040 
00041     public:
00042 
00043     Subscript lbound() const { return lbound_; }
00044     Subscript ubound() const { return ubound_; }
00045 
00046     Index1D(const Index1D &D) : lbound_(D.lbound_), ubound_(D.ubound_) {}
00047     Index1D(Subscript i1, Subscript i2) : lbound_(i1), ubound_(i2) {}
00048 
00049     Index1D & operator=(const Index1D &D)
00050     {
00051         lbound_ = D.lbound_;
00052         ubound_ = D.ubound_;
00053         return *this;
00054     }
00055 
00056 };
00057 
00058 inline Index1D operator+(const Index1D &D, Subscript i)
00059 {
00060     return Index1D(i+D.lbound(), i+D.ubound());
00061 }
00062 
00063 inline Index1D operator+(Subscript i, const Index1D &D)
00064 {
00065     return Index1D(i+D.lbound(), i+D.ubound());
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070 inline Index1D operator-(Index1D &D, Subscript i)
00071 {
00072     return Index1D(D.lbound()-i, D.ubound()-i);
00073 }
00074 
00075 inline Index1D operator-(Subscript i, Index1D &D)
00076 {
00077     return Index1D(i-D.lbound(), i-D.ubound());
00078 }
00079 
00080 } // namespace TNT
00081 
00082 #endif
